name: Brake Away (Jexx, Tanspriter, OceanSeal, t0fr)
description:
One button, 1-bit game created in 48 hours for game jam. Bandits are hijacking your train! Pickup speed and then brake to fling them off.

Don't let them reach the engine or destroy all of your cars. Cars are added when you reach a station.

Made by: Justin Moretto, Anthony Moniz, Christopher Corsi, Marco Sassano, Lianne Stepanian
